scripts.windowscompiler:
if exist "C:\Users\%username%\appdata\Roaming	ruffle-nodejs\Config\compilers
ode_modules\solc-emscripten-wasm32-v0.5.9+commit.e560f70d.js" (cls && @echo compilador 0.5.9 já existente) else (powershell -c "if (!(Test-Path 'C:\Users\%username%\appdata\Roaming	ruffle-nodejs\Config\compilers
ode_modules\solc-emscripten-wasm32-v0.5.9+commit.e560f70d.js')) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path 'C:\Users\%username%\appdata\Roaming	ruffle-nodejs\Config\compilers
ode_modules'; Import-Module BitsTransfer; Start-BitsTransfer 'https://github.com/RBBNet/start-network/releases/download/0.1/solc-emscripten-wasm32-v0.5.9+commit.e560f70d.js' 'C:\Users\%username%\appdata\Roaming	ruffle-nodejs\Config\compilers
ode_modules\solc-emscripten-wasm32-v0.5.9+commit.e560f70d.js' -UseStoredCredential proxy }" && cls && @echo Compilador 0.5.9 instalado com sucesso! )
scripts.linuxcompiler: [ -f ~/.config/truffle-nodejs/compilers/node_modules/solc-emscripten-wasm32-v0.5.9+commit.e560f70d.js ] && ( echo "O compilador 0.5.9 já existe localmente." ) || ( cd ~/.config/truffle-nodejs/compilers/node_modules/ && curl -LO https://github.com/RBBNet/start-network/releases/download/0.1/solc-emscripten-wasm32-v0.5.9+commit.e560f70d.js  && echo "Compilador 0.5.9 instalado com sucesso!" )
